      • addMenuItem

        void addMenuItem(MenuItem mi)
        Parameters:
        mi - the menu item you want to add
        Precondition:
        menu item != null
        Postcondition:
        new size menu = old size menu + 1
        Invariant:
        for checking null objects

      • editMenuItem

        void editMenuItem(MenuItem miOld,
                  MenuItem miNew)
        Parameters:
        miOld - old menu item will be replace
        miNew - new menu item will be add instead of old one
        Precondition:
        (old menu item != new menu item) != null
        Postcondition:
        the item is edited
        Invariant:
        for checking null objects

      • deleteMenuItem

        void deleteMenuItem(MenuItem mi)
        Parameters:
        mi - the menu item you want to delete
        Precondition:
        menu item != null
        Postcondition:
        new size menu = old size menu - 1
        Invariant:
        for checking null objects

      • addOrder

        void addOrder(Order o,
              java.util.ArrayList<MenuItem> mi)
        Parameters:
        o - is the specs of the order you want to add
        mi - is the list of the products connected to the order
        Precondition:
        order != null and menu items != null and order id greater than 0
        Postcondition:
        new size orders = old size orders + 1
        Invariant:
        for checking null objects, int greater than 0

      • computePrice

        float computePrice(Order o)
        Parameters:
        o - is the order to compute the price of
        Returns:
        a float value that represents the price of the order
        Precondition:
        order != null and order id greater than 0
        Postcondition:
        price greater than 0
        Invariant:
        for checking null objects, int greater than 0

      • generateBill

        void generateBill(Order o)
        Parameters:
        o - is the order to print the bill as .txt
        Precondition:
        order != null and order id greater than 0
        Postcondition:
        a txt file is generated
        Invariant:
        for checking null objects, int greater than 0
